stories.title: Core Review Engine with Default Profile
stories.description: Working /review command that can analyze a single file using default.yml profile. Includes profile loader, YAML parser, CLI command, slash command template, and basic report generation with blocker/warning/suggestion severity levels.

stories.title: Hodge Self-Review Profile
stories.description: Profile for reviewing slash commands and CLI-template coordination (hodge-self-review.yml). Includes pattern definitions and custom instructions for Hodge-specific quality checks.

stories.title: Scope System (directory/pattern/recent)
stories.description: Extends review to analyze directories, patterns, and recent changes. Includes directory recursion, glob pattern matching, and git history analysis for --recent flag.

stories.title: Starter Profiles (React/API/Test Quality)
stories.description: Three community-ready profiles for common tech stacks: react-components.yml, api-design.yml, test-quality.yml with best practices and pattern definitions.

stories.title: Harden Integration (Feature-Level Review)
stories.description: Integrates AI-driven code review into /harden command before validation. Updates harden.md template with profile subset logic and surfaces findings in pre-check.

stories.title: Documentation and Profile Guidelines
stories.description: Complete documentation for /review command usage and custom profile creation. Includes README, profile schema docs, best practices guide, and examples.
